txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken wooden maces taken from the weakest of the foes dwelling in the western stretches of the Lone-lands. Bring them to Gadaric Munce at The Forsaken Inn.
'I see that you have been busy fighting our enemies. This is a good thing. We of the Eglain thank you for your efforts. Perhaps in time, we shall call you friend.'

'If you are truly looking to help the Eglain, then cut down our enemies and provide us with proof of their defeat. I assure you that we will recognize your efforts.\n\n'You will find broken wooden maces from the goblins, Orcs, and possibly half-orcs in the western reaches of the Lone-lands.'

Gadaric Munce of the Eglain has posted that he desires the broken wooden maces collected from the weaker Orcs, goblins, and half-orcs that make the western stretches of the Lone-lands their home. Gadaric can be found within The Forsaken Inn.
Deliver the broken wooden maces to Gadaric Munce at The Forsaken Inn

Defeat the sentient creatures found in the westernmost areas of the Lone-lands and collect their broken wooden maces. When you have collected enough you may return them to Gadaric Munce at the Forsaken Inn for a reward.
Wanted: Broken wooden maces taken from the weakest of the foes dwelling in the western stretches of the Lone-lands.
